name: Memory
description: Built-in agent memory for storing and retrieving information across conversations. This is automatically included in every agent.

tools.name: memory_set
tools.description: Store a value in memory with a key. Use this to remember user preferences, important information, or context for future conversations.

key.description: The key to store the value under (e.g., 'user_name', 'preferred_repo', 'project_deadline')

value.description: The value to store (will be converted to string)

examples.query: Remember that my name is Alex
My main project is called TuneKit
Note that I prefer dark mode

tools.name: memory_get
tools.description: Retrieve a stored value from memory by its key.

examples.query: What project am I working on?

tools.name: memory_delete
tools.description: Remove a stored value from memory.

tools.name: memory_list
tools.description: List all keys currently stored in memory.

examples.query: What do you remember about me?
